data.title: Mi Fu and the Classical Tradition of Chinese Calligraphy by Ledderose Lothar
data.meta_description: Mi Fu and the Classical Tradition of Chinese Calligraphy by Ledderose, Lothar and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: VG- (Very Good Minus). 1st Edition. Black/gray cloth with trace wear and rubbing, and lightly bumped spine ends. Jacket in archival mylar sleeve has light rubbing and edgewear; tiny fleck of white paint to rear panel; 1" tear to upper edge; flaps not clipped. Binding sound, interior clean save for traces of a few numbers pencilled to ffep. No prev owner names, stickers or stamps. Not ex-library. 131 pp + 50 b/w photographic plates.

Hardcover. Size: 9.5x12.25 inches, Very good plus condition with text clean and binding sound in a very good dust jacket with some rubbing.

Hardcover. Quarto; VG-/G+; Hardcover with DJ; DJ spine, black with white print; DJ has slight edgewear, slight shelfwear; Boards quarter bound with black cloth to spine and grey cloth to boards, slight wear to spine caps and corners, else clean and strong; Text block clean and tight; xi, 131 pages + 50 pages of b&w plates, frontispiece. [Shelf: East Asian Art] Oversized order. Additional shipping and handling may be necessary for expedited/international orders. Economy international shipping unavailable due to size/weight restriction(s). Contact seller if you have any questions. NOTE: Shelved in Netdesk office, in wraparound bookcase next to 15's. 1351771. FP New Rockville Stock.
